title: place.bookingAvailability
description: Indicates whether the place still has tickets or reservations available. Currently only contains a `type` that can be `Available` or `Unavailable`, but can later be expanded with more detailed info.

type.description:
One of two possible types.

- `Available`: The place still has available tickets or reservations
- `Unavailable`: The place has no more available tickets or reservations.
